conclusion: Analyze the flow direction of the liquid as it passes through each baffle.
Baffle A: The liquid flows from left to right.
Baffle B: The liquid flows from top to bottom.
Baffle C: The liquid flows from right to left.
Baffle D: The liquid flows from bottom to top.
Baffle A: The liquid exits on the right side.
Baffle B: The liquid exits on the bottom.
Baffle C: The liquid exits on the left side.
Baffle D: The liquid exits on the top.
From Baffle A: The liquid will exit on the right side and flow towards container E.
From Baffle B: The liquid will exit on the bottom and flow towards container F.
From Baffle C: The liquid will exit on the left side and flow towards container E.
From Baffle D: The liquid will exit on the top and flow towards container F.
Liquid from baffles A and C will flow into container E.
Liquid from baffles B and D will flow into container F.
Final Answer: Liquid will flow into containers E and F.
